divs: sighting details on 4\9\12 around 8:50pm at night i was in my backyard watering plants and and looked up in the sky and saw a bright object and was wondering what star it was, and then all of a sudden it started moving. i called my wife outside as it was moving in a straight line and thought it was a satellite, and as we were watching it move in a straight direction for about 1 minute it all of a sudden it disappeared. i tried to record it on my iphone 4s but the video didn't come out very well, but i have included it anyway.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Santa Barbara
There were 2 other sightings in Santa Barbara on or around April 9th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
